1fc57ba6-2481-450e-aebf-44a215b103b8.name: Classroom
1fc57ba6-2481-450e-aebf-44a215b103b8.cmd:
#!/bin/bash

# URL do Google Classroom
URL="https://classroom.google.com/u/2/"

# Abre o URL no navegador padrão
xdg-open "$URL"

7d9a3168-d085-4bd3-92ba-88f983229935.name: Opencode
7d9a3168-d085-4bd3-92ba-88f983229935.description: Custom Local AI Agent and Chatbot
7d9a3168-d085-4bd3-92ba-88f983229935.cmd:
#!/bin/bash
SERVER="http://127.0.0.1:4096"
PROXY="http://127.0.0.1:4095"
WEB_HOME="$PROXY/L2hvbWUvZ3Vp/session"

# Inicia servidor (que também inicia o proxy)
if ! curl -sf --max-time 1 "$SERVER/session" > /dev/null 2>&1; then
  nohup /home/gui/.opencode/bin/opencode-server.sh >> /tmp/opencode-server.log 2>&1 &
  for i in $(seq 1 60); do
    sleep 0.5
    curl -sf --max-time 1 "$SERVER/session" > /dev/null 2>&1 && break
  done
fi

# Aguarda proxy (max 5s)
for i in $(seq 1 10); do
  curl -sf --max-time 1 "$PROXY/session" > /dev/null 2>&1 && break
  sleep 0.5
done

google-chrome --new-tab "$WEB_HOME"
